mapper.select: SELECT B.idx , B.title , B.markdown_content , B.in_user_id , B.in_user_email FROM blog B WHERE B.del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY B.idx

WITH RECURSIVE CTE AS ( SELECT B.ref , B.idx , B.p_ref , B.content , B.in_user_id , B.in_user_email , B.up_user_id , B.up_user_email , B.up_dt , 1 AS LEVEL , CONCAT(B.ref) AS SORT FROM blog_re B WHERE B.idx = #{idx} AND p_ref = '0' UNION ALL SELECT BB.ref , BB.idx , BB.p_ref , BB.content , BB.in_user_id , BB.in_user_email , BB.up_user_id , BB.up_user_email , BB.up_dt , 1 + LEVEL AS LEVEL , CONCAT(SORT, ' ', CONCAT(BB.ref)) AS SORT FROM blog_re BB JOIN CTE ON BB.p_ref = CTE.ref WHERE BB.idx = #{idx} ) SELECT B.* , U.picture FROM CTE B JOIN user U ON B.in_user_email = U.email ORDER BY B.SORT

SELECT B.ref , B.idx , B.p_ref , B.content , B.in_user_id , B.in_user_email , B.up_user_id , B.up_user_email , B.up_dt , U.picture FROM blog_re B JOIN user U ON B.in_user_email = U.email WHERE B.idx = #{idx} AND B.ref = #{ref} ORDER BY B.ref
